section.heading: Power of personal representative of deceased member.
section.text: If a member dies, the deceased member’s personal representative or other legal representative may exercise the rights of a transferee provided in § 29-805.02(c) and, for the purposes of settling the estate, the rights of a current member under § 29-804.10.

annotations.annotation: Uniform Law: This section is based on § 504 of the Uniform Limited Company Act (2006 Act).
This section is referenced in § 29-805.02 and § 29-806.03.
